nodes.text: The Lesser Plooriod Cluster was a location in the galaxy that contained the Urce sector. A hyperspace route, passing through the Urce sector, was mapped by both the Trade Federation and Ithorians from Ithor. Both the Trade Federation and the human inhabitants of the Urce sector claimed ownership of their portions of the route, and the Ithorians unsuccessfully tried to reason with the Galactic Senate to get the route map shared.
